title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 39.1 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 39.1 - Policy

State Regulations

It is the policy of the State and this department to conserve
and protect State revenues through the efficient and prudent expenditure of

State funds received from the sale of bonds and/or notes pursuant to the

Accelerated Capacity and Transportation Improvements of the Nineties Bond Act. It is further the policy of the State and this department that, to the extent
possible, New York State contractors, subcontractors and suppliers participate
and bid on contracts for improvements financed through the use of such
revenues. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
39.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
